summary: This is an email chain from August 26, 2019, regarding logistical planning for a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case scheduled for the following day. The email discusses the need for FBI agents to assist with victim support and press management, noting an anticipated attendance of at least 20 victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the hearing mentioned in the email; the case is referred to as 'the Epstein case'.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing
events.description: A hearing regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case was scheduled for 10:30 AM. The SDNY requested FBI agent assistance for victim support and managing press presence, with at least 20 victims anticipated to attend.

keyFacts: A hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case was scheduled for August 27, 2019, at 10:30 AM.
The SDNY requested FBI assistance for the hearing, specifically for agent support with victims and to help avoid the press.
At least 20 victims were expected to attend the hearing, with upwards of 30 anticipated.
